Modul htl.steyr.javafx_minesweeper_tplatzer
Package htl.steyr.javafx_minesweeper_tplatzer.controller

Klasse UsernameMenuController

java.lang.Object
htl.steyr.javafx_minesweeper_tplatzer.controller.Controller
htl.steyr.javafx_minesweeper_tplatzer.controller.UsernameMenuController
public class UsernameMenuController extends Controller
Controller for the "Username Menu" of the Minesweeper application.

This menu allows the user to change their username, ensuring valid input (1-16 characters, no spaces). The updated username is saved in the user data. The menu provides options to return to the main menu or save the new username.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • UsernameMenuController

      public UsernameMenuController(String username, String style, boolean muted)
      Constructs a new UsernameMenuController with the specified username, style, and mute settings.

      This constructor initializes the controller with the player's username, the chosen visual style, and whether sound effects are muted.

      Parameter:
      username - The username of the player.
      style - The visual style of the menu (e.g., "retro", "modern").
      muted - true if sound effects are muted, false otherwise.

  • Methodendetails

    • start

      public void start(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Starts the UsernameMenuController and initializes the username menu interface.

      This method sets up the stage and initializes all required UI elements for the username menu. If the sound is not muted, background music specific to the username menu is played. The stage is prepared and the window layout is initialized.

      Parameter:
      stage - The Stage instance used to display the username menu.
